section.title: Operations Bridge Integration
section.para: The &product; monitoring solution (&o_monitor;) can easily be integrated with your existing monitoring tools. Integrating &product; &o_monitor; with Operations Bridge using the Operations Bridge Connector simplifies monitoring and managing events and topology information.
The integration provides the following functionality:

listitem.para: Forwarding of &productname; Monasca alerts and topology to Operations Bridge for event correlation
Customization of forwarded events and topology
